data.description: Looking for the perfect home? Well, look no further! With fresh paint, bamboo flooring installed throughout the 1st & 2nd floor, wood plank porcelain tile in the baths and an open floor concept, this home is sure to please. The family room features a custom stacked stone electric fireplace, and the kitchen features a large pantry, granite countertops, a farm style sink, double oven and stainless-steel appliances making this home perfect for a growing family. All the bedrooms are located conveniently on the 2nd floor also featuring bamboo floors with the primary suite boasting a large primary bathroom featuring double vanities, a garden tub, separate standup shower, a spacious walk-in closet and more! Out back, you'll find a huge fenced in yard w/ a storage shed, fire pit and custom planters' w/ irrigation in the front & back. Neighborhood features a park for the kids making this home even more perfect.
